title: 25 Science Minibooks for Emergent Readers Homeschool Educational
description:
CLICK ON MY NAME (CEZEN) TO SEE A COMPLETE LIST OF MY HOMESCHOOL AND EDUCATIONAL TORRENTS.

I am trying to create a new "Homeschool" genre/tag on The Bay by posting my hard to find Homeschool, Educational Software and Curriculum and Ebooks. 

Editorial Reviews
Book Description
Build Literacy With Easy and Adorable Reproducible Mini-Books on Favorite Science Topics
"Home, Sweet, Home," "A Butterfly Grows Up," "My Five Senses" ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ young readers will love learning about animal bones, life cycles, the human body, weather, plants and seeds, and other favorite science topics with these irresistible mini books. Rhymes, repetition, and predictable language help build young children&#039;s confidence in reading. Includes easy how-to&#039;s and hands-on activities to extend learning. 

About the Author
Carol Pugliano holds a Master&#039;s degree in Educational Theater from New York University and has published several plays and stories for young children. Carol is the author of Scholastic&#039;s Easy-to-Read Folk and Fairy Tale Plays and 25 Just-Right Plays for Emergent Readers.
